data.title: DustCharge: Charge distribution for a dust grain
data.name: DustCharge
data.description: Calculate the equilibrium charge distribution for a dust grain of a given size and composition, depending on the local interstellar medium conditions, such as: density, temperature, ionization fraction, local radiation field strength and cosmic ray ionization fraction.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "- Add a note to download the tables by Draine."
"#DustCharge functions." suggests a small, domain-specific codebase rather than a general-purpose library.
To-do and done lists describe adding physical processes (cosmic ray currents, shielding) to calculations, indicating it performs scientific/astrophysical computations directly used in research.
